title: Am i the only tank main that doesnt like Stoneplate?
body:
Does really every role needs to become an active item? There are already plenty of active items to mange .
An other reason i dont like this item is because it doesnt feel strong even though i know it is really strong. locket = immediat shield, zzrot= voidlings, zhonias= untargetable, glory=gottagofast, frostqueen=ghosts,.. -> stoneplate: i get a big bigger and i didnt die but if i didnt knew i pushed to button i would have tough there was a bug that made some spels put their spell through.
Also its basic stats always make me feel bad. Yeah i know about the doubling resistance and the hp on active but when you buy it its a ton of gold for 80 resistances which puts me off it.

TDLR: if we really do need this new active item as a core item, pls make the active more clear on use and give more stats in item and less in the active.
